https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mwpM9vZ2sT5e7D1eP3HsjValfC3.jpg Harold, a middle-aged Mexican theatre acting coach, travels to New York and finds himself obsessing over a precocious teenage boy named Felix, who he believes is the reincarnation of his first childhood love. A Boy Like That
